text: [On prostil] takzhe tekh trekh [muzhey], kotoryye otstali [v puti vo vremya pokhoda na Tabuk], tak chto zemlya pri vsey yeye protyazhennosti stala tesnoy dlya nikh, a serdtsa ikh szhalis' [ot strakha], i oni podumali, chto net im ubezhishcha ot [nakazaniya] Allakha, krome kak u Nego. Potom On prostil ikh, daby oni raskayalis', ibo Allakh - proshchayushchiy, miloserdnyy
